name: ABACOE
overview:
Advanced Business Analytics Centre of Excellence (ABACOE) is a niche organization that provides an unique blend of applied mathematics, statistics, analytical tools and business processes to meet the industry demand for Business Analytics Professionals.

With the proliferation of transactional systems like ERP, SCM, HCM, CRM etc, companies are witnessing an overflow of business data. But there is an absolute scarcity of skills to make sense of the available data and more importantly to create some value out of it.

Large companies across the world are increasingly turning their focus on interpreting their business data to gain a competitive edge. This trend is leading to a significant demand of Analytical talent with strong quantitative skills combined with adept analytics software tools. At ABACOE, we strive to bridge this gap by constantly working on understanding the industry pain points with respect to “Data Analysis” and train people in all aspects of Analytics and Business Intelligence.
